results.name: Riordan array (1/(1+x),1) read by rows.
comment: Row sums are A059841. Diagonal sums are (-1)^n*A008619 with g.f. 1/((1+x)(1-x^2)).
Inverse of A097806. Equals B^(-1)*A097805, where B is the binomial matrix.
formula: Triangle array of numbers T(n, k) with T(n, k)=if(n>=k, (-1)^(n-k), 0).
T(n+1,0) = -T(n,0), T(n+1,k+1) = T(n,k) for k = 1..n. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 17 2014
